00624                                                                                                 }
00625                                                                                                 // Determine if we have enough action points!
00626                                                                                                 else if ( UIMouseOnValidAttackLocation( pSoldier ) && SelectedMercCanAffordAttack( ) )
00627                                                                                                 {
00628                                                                                                       *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_CONFIM_ACTION;
00629                                                                                                       pSoldier->sStartGridNo = usMapPos;
00630                                                                                                 }
00631                                                                                           }
00632 
00633                                                                                     }
00634                                                                               }
00635                                                                               break;
00636 
00637                                                                         case CONFIRM_ACTION_MODE:
00638 
00639                                                                               *puiNewEvent = CA_MERC_SHOOT;
00640                                                                               break;
00641 
00642                                                                         case LOOKCURSOR_MODE:
00643                                                                               // If we cannot actually do anything, return to movement mode
00644                                                                               *puiNewEvent = LC_LOOK;
00645                                                                               break;
00646 
00647                                                                         case TALKCURSOR_MODE:
00648 
00649                                                                               if ( HandleTalkInit( ) )
00650                                                                               {
00651                                                                                     *puiNewEvent = TA_TALKINGMENU;
00652                                                                               }
00653                                                                               break;
00654 
00655                                                                         case GETTINGITEM_MODE:
00656 
00657                                                                               // Remove menu!
00658                                                                               // RemoveItemPickupMenu( );
00659                                                                               break;
00660 
00661                                                                         case TALKINGMENU_MODE:
00662 
00663                                                                               //HandleTalkingMenuEscape( TRUE );
00664                                                                               break;
00665 
00666                                                                         case EXITSECTORMENU_MODE:
00667 
00668                                                                               RemoveSectorExitMenu( FALSE );
00669                                                                               break;
00670 
00671                                                                         case OPENDOOR_MENU_MODE:
00672 
00673                                                                               CancelOpenDoorMenu( );
00674                                                                               HandleOpenDoorMenu( );
00675                                                                               *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
00676                                                                               break;
00677 
00678                                                                         }
00679                                                             }
00680                                                       }
00681                                                 }
00682                                           }
00683                                     }
00684                               }
00685                         }
00686 
00687                         // Reset flag
00688                         fLeftButtonDown = FALSE;
00689                         fIgnoreLeftUp   = FALSE;
00690                         fClickHoldIntercepted = FALSE;
00691                         fCanCheckForSpeechAdvance = FALSE;
00692                         gfFirstCycleMovementStarted = FALSE;
00693 
00694                         // Reset counter
00695                         RESETCOUNTER( LMOUSECLICK_DELAY_COUNTER );
00696 
00697                   }
00698 
00699             }
00700 
00701       }
00702       else
00703       {
00704             // Set mouse down to false
00705             //fLeftButtonDown = FALSE;
00706 
00707             // OK, handle special cases like if we are dragging and holding for a burst spread and
00708             // release mouse over another mouse region
00709             if ( gfBeginBurstSpreadTracking )
00710             {
00711                   if(   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
00712                   {
00713                         pSoldier->fDoSpread = FALSE;
00714                   }
00715                   gfBeginBurstSpreadTracking = FALSE;
00716             }
00717       }
00718 
00719 }
00720 
00721 void  QueryTBRightButton( UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
00722 {
00723       static BOOLEAN    fClickHoldIntercepted = FALSE;
00724       static BOOLEAN    fClickIntercepted = FALSE;
00725       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00726       UINT16                        usMapPos;
00727       BOOLEAN                       fDone = FALSE;
00728       if (!GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *) &usMapPos ) )
00729       {
00730             return;
00731       }
00732 
00733   if ( gViewportRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
00734       {
00735 
00736             // RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON
00737             if ( gViewportRegion.ButtonState & MSYS_RIGHT_BUTTON )
00738             {
00739                   if ( !fRightButtonDown )
00740                   {
00741                         fRightButtonDown = TRUE;
00742                         RESETCOUNTER( RMOUSECLICK_DELAY_COUNTER );
00743                   }
00744 
00745                   // CHECK COMBINATIONS
00746                   if ( fLeftButtonDown )
00747                   {
00748                   }
00749                   else
00750                   {
00751                         if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
00752                         {
00753                               // IF HERE, DO A CLICK-HOLD IF IN INTERVAL
00754                               if ( COUNTERDONE( RMOUSECLICK_DELAY_COUNTER ) && !fClickHoldIntercepted )
00755                               {
00756                                     // Switch on UI mode
00757                                     switch( gCurrentUIMode )
00758                                     {
00759                                           case IDLE_MODE:
00760                                           case ACTION_MODE:
00761                                           case HANDCURSOR_MODE:
00762                                           case LOOKCURSOR_MODE:
00763                                           case TALKCURSOR_MODE:
00764                                           case MOVE_MODE:
00765 
00766                                                 // Check if we're on terrain
00767                                                 //if ( !gfUIFullTargetFound )
00768                                                 //{
00769                                                       // ATE:
00770                                                       fDone = FALSE;
00771 
00772                                                       if ( ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & OWNED_MERC ) && !( guiUIFullTargetFlags & UNCONSCIOUS_MERC ) )
00773                                                       {
00774                                                             // Select guy
00775                                                             if(   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusUIFullTargetID ) && ( gpItemPointer == NULL ) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
00776                                                             { 
00777                                                                   //if( pSoldier->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY )
00778                                                                   {
00779                         PopupAssignmentMenuInTactical( pSoldier );
00780                                                             fClickHoldIntercepted = TRUE;
00781                       }
00782                     }
00783                   }
00784 
00785                                                       if( fDone == TRUE )
00786                                                       {
00787                                                             break;
00788                                                       }
00789 
00790                                                       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY && !fClickHoldIntercepted )
00791                                                       {
00792                                                             *puiNewEvent = U_MOVEMENT_MENU;
00793                                                             fClickHoldIntercepted = TRUE;
00794                                                       }
00795                                                 //}
00796                                                 //else 
00797                                                 //{
00798                                                       // If we are on a selected guy
00799                                                 //    if ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & SELECTED_MERC && !( guiUIFullTargetFlags & UNCONSCIOUS_MERC ) )
00800                                                 //    {
00801                                                             //*puiNewEvent = U_POSITION_MENU;
00802                                                             //fClickHoldIntercepted = TRUE;
00803                                                 //    }
00804                                           //          else if ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & OWNED_MERC )
00805                                           //          {
00806                                                             // If we are on a non-selected guy selected guy
00807                                           //          }
00808 
00809                                                 //}
00810                                                 break;
00811                                     }
00812                               }
00813                         }
00814             
00815                   }
00816 
00817             }
00818             else
00819             {
00820                   if ( fRightButtonDown )
00821                   {
00822 
00823                         if ( fLeftButtonDown )
00824                         {
00825                                fIgnoreLeftUp = TRUE;  
00826 
00827                                if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
00828                                {
00829                                           // ATE:
00830                                           if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
00831                                           {
00832                                                 switch( gCurrentUIMode )
00833                                                 {
00834                                                       case CONFIRM_MOVE_MODE: 
00835                                                       case MOVE_MODE:   
00836 
00837                                                        if ( gfUICanBeginAllMoveCycle )
00838                                                        {
00839                                                              *puiNewEvent = M_CYCLE_MOVE_ALL;
00840                                                        }
00841                                                        else
00842                                                        {
00843                                                              if ( !gfFirstCycleMovementStarted )
00844                                                              {
00845                                                                    gfFirstCycleMovementStarted = TRUE;
00846 
00847                                                                    // OK, set this guy's movement mode to crawling fo rthat we will start cycling in run.....
00848                                                                    if ( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->usUIMovementMode != RUNNING )
00849                                                                    {
00850                                                                          // ATE: UNLESS WE ARE IN RUNNING MODE ALREADY
00851                                                                          MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->usUIMovementMode = CRAWLING;
00852                                                                    }
00853                                                              }
00854 
00855                                                              // Give event to cycle movement
00856                                                              *puiNewEvent = M_CYCLE_MOVEMENT;
00857                                                              break;
00858                                                        }
00859                                                 }
00860 
00861                                                 // ATE: Added cancel of burst mode....
00862                                                 if ( gfBeginBurstSpreadTracking )
00863                                                 {
00864                                                       gfBeginBurstSpreadTracking = FALSE;
00865                                                       gfRTClickLeftHoldIntercepted = TRUE;
00866                                                       MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->fDoSpread                    = FALSE;
00867                                                       fClickHoldIntercepted = TRUE;
00868                                                       *puiNewEvent = A_END_ACTION;
00869                                                       gCurrentUIMode = MOVE_MODE;
00870                                                 }
00871                                           }
00872                                }
00873                         }
00874                         else
00875                         {
00876                               if ( !fClickHoldIntercepted && !fClickIntercepted )
00877                               {
00878                                if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
00879                                {
00880                                           // ATE:
00881                                           if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
00882                                           {
00883                                                 // Switch on UI mode
00884                                                 switch( gCurrentUIMode )
00885                                                 {
00886                                                       case IDLE_MODE:
00887 
00888                                                             break;
00889 
00890                                                       case MOVE_MODE:
00891 
00892                                                             // We have here a change to action mode
00893                                                             *puiNewEvent = M_CHANGE_TO_ACTION;
00894                                                             fClickIntercepted = TRUE;
00895                                                             break;
00896 
00897                                                       case ACTION_MODE:
00898 
00899                                                             // We have here a change to action mode
00900                                                             *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
00901                                                             fClickIntercepted = TRUE;
00902                                                             break;
00903 
00904                                                       case CONFIRM_MOVE_MODE:
00905 
00906                                                             *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
00907                                                             fClickIntercepted = TRUE;
00908                                                             break;
00909 
00910                                                       case HANDCURSOR_MODE:
00911                                                             // If we cannot actually do anything, return to movement mode
00912                                                             *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
00913                                                             break;
00914 
00915                                                       case LOOKCURSOR_MODE:
00916                                                       case TALKCURSOR_MODE:
00917 
00918                                                             // If we cannot actually do anything, return to movement mode
00919                                                             *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
00920                                                             break;
00921 
00922                                                       case CONFIRM_ACTION_MODE:
00923 
00924                                                                   if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
00925                                                                   {
00926                                                                         HandleRightClickAdjustCursor( pSoldier, usMapPos );
00927                                                                   }
00928                                                                   fClickIntercepted = TRUE;
00929                                                                   break;
00930 
00931                                                       case MENU_MODE:
00932 
00933                                                             // If we get a hit here and we're in menu mode, quit the menu mode
00934                                                             EndMenuEvent( guiCurrentEvent );
00935                                                             fClickIntercepted = TRUE;
00936                                                             break;
00937 
00938                                                 }
00939                                           }
00940                                }
00941                                else
00942                                {
00943                                           if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
00944                                           {
00945                                                 gfItemPointerDifferentThanDefault = !gfItemPointerDifferentThanDefault;
00946                                           }
00947                                }
00948                               }
00949                         }
00950                   }
00951                   // Reset flag
00952                   fRightButtonDown = FALSE;
00953                   fClickHoldIntercepted = FALSE;
00954                   fClickIntercepted = FALSE;
00955 
00956                   // Reset counter
00957                   RESETCOUNTER( RMOUSECLICK_DELAY_COUNTER );
00958 
00959             }
00960       }
00961 
00962 }
00963 
00964 
00965 extern BOOLEAN    gUIActionModeChangeDueToMouseOver;
00966 
00967 void GetTBMousePositionInput( UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
00968 {
00969       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
00970       static UINT16                 usOldMapPos = 0;
00971       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00972       BOOLEAN                                   bHandleCode;
00973       static BOOLEAN          fOnValidGuy = FALSE;
00974       static UINT32                 uiMoveTargetSoldierId = NO_SOLDIER;
00975 
00976 
00977       if (!GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos ) )
00978       {
00979             return;
00980       }
00981 
00982   if ( gViewportRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
00983       {
00984             // Handle highlighting stuff
00985             HandleObjectHighlighting( );
00986 
00987             // Check if we have an item in our hands...
00988             if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
00989             {
00990                    *puiNewEvent = A_ON_TERRAIN;
00991                    return;
00992             }
00993 
00994             // Switch on modes
00995             switch( gCurrentUIMode )
00996             {
00997                   case LOCKUI_MODE:
00998                         *puiNewEvent = LU_ON_TERRAIN;
00999                         break;
01000 
01001                   case LOCKOURTURN_UI_MODE:
01002                         *puiNewEvent = LA_ON_TERRAIN;
01003                         break;
01004 
01005                   case IDLE_MODE:
01006                         *puiNewEvent = I_ON_TERRAIN;
01007                         break;
01008 
01009                   case ENEMYS_TURN_MODE:
01010                         *puiNewEvent = ET_ON_TERRAIN;
01011                         break;
01012 
01013                   case LOOKCURSOR_MODE:
01014                         *puiNewEvent = LC_ON_TERRAIN;
01015                         break;
01016 
01017                   case TALKCURSOR_MODE:
01018                         if ( uiMoveTargetSoldierId != NOBODY )
01019                         {
01020                                if( gfUIFullTargetFound )
01021                                {
01022                                           if ( gusUIFullTargetID != uiMoveTargetSoldierId )
01023                                           {
01024                                                 *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01025                                                 return;
01026                                           }
01027                                }
01028                                else
01029                                {
01030                                           *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01031                                           return;
01032                                }
01033                         }
01034                    *puiNewEvent = T_ON_TERRAIN;
01035                         break;
01036 
01037                   case MOVE_MODE:
01038 
01039                         uiMoveTargetSoldierId = NO_SOLDIER;
01040 
01041                         // Check for being on terrain
01042                         if(   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
01043                         {
01044                                if ( IsValidJumpLocation( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE ) )
01045                                {
01046                                           gsJumpOverGridNo = usMapPos;
01047                                           *puiNewEvent = JP_ON_TERRAIN;
01048                                           return;
01049                                }
01050                                else 
01051                                {
01052                                      if( gfUIFullTargetFound )
01053                                      {
01054                                            // ATE: Don't do this automatically for enemies......
01055                                            if ( MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->bTeam != ENEMY_TEAM )
01056                                            {
01057                                                       uiMoveTargetSoldierId = gusUIFullTargetID;
01058                                                       if ( IsValidTalkableNPC( (UINT8)gusUIFullTargetID, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE ) && !_KeyDown( SHIFT ) && !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) && !ValidQuickExchangePosition( ) )
01059                                                       {
01060                                                             *puiNewEvent = T_CHANGE_TO_TALKING;
01061                                                             return;
01062                                                       }
01063                                            }
01064                                      }
01065                                }
01066                         }
01067                         *puiNewEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
01068                         break;
01069 
01070                   case ACTION_MODE:
01071 
01072                         // First check if we are on a guy, if so, make selected if it's ours
01073                         // Check if the guy is visible
01074                         guiUITargetSoldierId = NOBODY;
01075 
01076                         fOnValidGuy = FALSE;
01077 
01078                         if ( gfUIFullTargetFound  )
01079                         //if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
01080                         {
01081                                     if ( IsValidTargetMerc( (UINT8)gusUIFullTargetID ) )
01082                                     {
01083                                            guiUITargetSoldierId = gusUIFullTargetID;
01084 
01085                                            if ( MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01086                                            {
01087                                                 fOnValidGuy = TRUE;
01088                                            }
01089                                            else
01090                                            {
01091                                                       if ( gUIActionModeChangeDueToMouseOver )
01092                                                       {
01093                                                             *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01094                                                             return;
01095                                                       }
01096                                            }
01097                                     }
01098                         } 
01099                         else
01100                         {
01101                               if ( gUIActionModeChangeDueToMouseOver )
01102                               {
01103                                     *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01104                                     return;
01105                               }
01106                         }
01107                         *puiNewEvent = A_ON_TERRAIN;
01108                         break;
01109 
01110                   case GETTINGITEM_MODE:
01111 
01112                         break;
01113 
01114                   case TALKINGMENU_MODE:
01115 
01116                         if ( HandleTalkingMenu( ) )
01117                         {
01118                               *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01119                         }
01120                         break;
01121 
01122                   case EXITSECTORMENU_MODE:
01123 
01124                         if ( HandleSectorExitMenu( ) )
01125                         {
01126                               *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01127                         }
01128                         break;
01129 
01130                   case OPENDOOR_MENU_MODE:
01131                         bHandleCode = HandleOpenDoorMenu( ); // I think its nicer to avoid assignments in conditionals (jonathanl)
01132                         if ( bHandleCode )
01133                         {
01134                               // OK, IF we are not canceling, set ui back!
01135                               if ( bHandleCode == 2 )
01136                               {
01137                                     *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01138                               }
01139                               else
01140                               {
01141                               }
01142                         }
01143                         break;
01144 
01145                   case JUMPOVER_MODE:
01146 
01147                         // ATE: Make sure!
01148                         if ( gsJumpOverGridNo != usMapPos )
01149                         {
01150                               *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01151                         }
01152                         else
01153                         {
01154                               *puiNewEvent = JP_ON_TERRAIN;
01155                         }
01156                         break;
01157 
01158                   case CONFIRM_MOVE_MODE:
01159 
01160                         if ( usMapPos != usOldMapPos )
01161                         {
01162                               // Switch event out of confirm mode
01163                               *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01164 
01165                               // Set off ALL move....
01166                               gfUIAllMoveOn = FALSE;
01167 
01168                               // ERASE PATH
01169                               ErasePath( TRUE );
01170                         }
01171                         break;
01172 
01173                   case CONFIRM_ACTION_MODE:
01174 
01175                         // DONOT CANCEL IF BURST
01176                         if(   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
01177                         {
01178                               if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst )
01179                               {
01180                                     pSoldier->sEndGridNo = usMapPos;
01181 
01182                                     if ( pSoldier->sEndGridNo != pSoldier->sStartGridNo && fLeftButtonDown )
01183                                     {
01184                                           pSoldier->fDoSpread = TRUE;
01185                                           gfBeginBurstSpreadTracking = TRUE;
01186                                     }
01187 
01188                                     if ( pSoldier->fDoSpread )
01189                                     {
01190                                           // Accumulate gridno
01191                                           AccumulateBurstLocation( usMapPos );
01192 
01193                                           *puiNewEvent = CA_ON_TERRAIN;
01194                                           break;
01195                                     }
01196                               }
01197                         }
01198 
01199                         // First check if we are on a guy, if so, make selected if it's ours
01200                         if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
01201                         {
01202                                if ( guiUITargetSoldierId != gusUIFullTargetID )
01203                                {
01204                                           // Switch event out of confirm mode
01205                                           *puiNewEvent = CA_END_CONFIRM_ACTION;           
01206                                }
01207                                else
01208                                {
01209                                           *puiNewEvent = CA_ON_TERRAIN;
01210                                }
01211                         }
01212                         else
01213                         {
01214                               // OK, if we were on a guy, and now we are off, go back!
01215                               if ( fOnValidGuy )
01216                               {
01217                                     // Switch event out of confirm mode
01218                                     *puiNewEvent = CA_END_CONFIRM_ACTION;           
01219                               }
01220                               else
01221                               {
01222                                     if ( ConfirmActionCancel( usMapPos, usOldMapPos ) )
01223                                     {
01224                                           // Switch event out of confirm mode
01225                                           *puiNewEvent = CA_END_CONFIRM_ACTION;           
01226                                     }
01227                                     else
01228                                     {
01229                                           *puiNewEvent = CA_ON_TERRAIN;
01230                                     }
01231                               }
01232                         }
01233                         break;
01234                         
01235                   case HANDCURSOR_MODE:
01236 
01237                         *puiNewEvent = HC_ON_TERRAIN;
01238                         break;
01239 
01240             }
01241 
01242             usOldMapPos = usMapPos;
01243 
01244       }
01245 }
01246 
01247 
01248 void GetPolledKeyboardInput( UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
01249 {
01250       static BOOLEAN    fShifted = FALSE;
01251       static BOOLEAN    fShifted2 = FALSE;
01252       static BOOLEAN    fCtrlDown = FALSE;
01253       static BOOLEAN    fAltDown = FALSE;
01254       static BOOLEAN    fDeleteDown=FALSE;
01255       static BOOLEAN    fEndDown=FALSE;
01256 
01257       // CHECK FOR POLLED KEYS!!
01258       // CHECK FOR CTRL
01259       switch( gCurrentUIMode )
01260       {
01261                   case DONT_CHANGEMODE:
01262                   case CONFIRM_MOVE_MODE:
01263                   case CONFIRM_ACTION_MODE:
01264                   case LOOKCURSOR_MODE:
01265                   case TALKCURSOR_MODE:
01266                   case IDLE_MODE:
01267                   case MOVE_MODE:
01268                   case ACTION_MODE:
01269                   case HANDCURSOR_MODE:
01270 
01271                         if ( _KeyDown( CTRL )   )
01272                         {
01273                               if ( fCtrlDown == FALSE )
01274                               {
01275                                     ErasePath( TRUE );
01276                                     gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
01277                               }
01278                               fCtrlDown = TRUE;
01279                               *puiNewEvent = HC_ON_TERRAIN;
01280                               
01281                         }
01282                         if ( !(_KeyDown( CTRL ) ) && fCtrlDown )
01283                         {
01284                               fCtrlDown = FALSE;
01285                               *puiNewEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
01286                               gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
01287                         }
01288                         break;
01289       }
01290 
01291       // CHECK FOR ALT 
01292       switch( gCurrentUIMode )
01293       {
01294                   case MOVE_MODE:
01295 
01296                         if ( _KeyDown( ALT )   )
01297                         {
01298                               if ( fAltDown == FALSE )
01299                               {
01300                                     // Get currently selected guy and change reverse....
01301                                     if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
01302                                     {
01303                                           gUIUseReverse = TRUE;
01304                                           ErasePath( TRUE );
01305                                           gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
01306                                     }
01307                               }
01308                               fAltDown = TRUE;
01309                               
01310                         }
01311                         if ( !(_KeyDown( ALT ) ) && fAltDown )
01312                         {
01313                               if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
01314                               {
01315                                     gUIUseReverse = FALSE;
01316                                     ErasePath( TRUE );
01317                                     gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
01318                               }
01319 
01320                               fAltDown = FALSE;
01321                         }
01322                         break;
01323       }
01324 
01325       // Check realtime input!
01326       if ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
01327       {
01328             //if ( _KeyDown( CAPS )  ) //&& !fShifted )
01329             //{
01330             //    fShifted = TRUE;
01331             //    if ( gCurrentUIMode != ACTION_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != CONFIRM_ACTION_MODE )
01332             //    {
01333             //          *puiNewEvent = CA_ON_TERRAIN;
01334             //    }
01335             //}
01336             //if ( !(_KeyDown( CAPS ) ) && fShifted )
01337             //{
01338             //    fShifted = FALSE;
01339             //    {
01340             //          *puiNewEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
01341             //    }
01342             //}
01343 
01344 
01345             if ( _KeyDown( SHIFT )  ) //&& !fShifted )
01346             {
01347                   fShifted2 = TRUE;
01348                   if ( gCurrentUIMode != MOVE_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != CONFIRM_MOVE_MODE )
01349                   {
01350                   //puiNewEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
01351                   }
01352             }
01353             if ( !(_KeyDown( SHIFT ) ) && fShifted2 )
01354             {
01355                   fShifted2 = FALSE;
01356                   if ( gCurrentUIMode != ACTION_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != CONFIRM_ACTION_MODE )
01357                   {
01358                   //    *puiNewEvent = A_ON_TERRAIN;
01359                   }
01360             }
01361 
01362       }
01363 
01364             if( _KeyDown( DEL ) )
01365       {
01366             DisplayCoverOfSelectedGridNo( );
01367 
01368             fDeleteDown = TRUE;
01369       }
01370 
01371       if( !_KeyDown( DEL ) && fDeleteDown )
01372       {
01373             RemoveCoverOfSelectedGridNo();
01374 
01375             fDeleteDown = FALSE;
01376       }
01377 
01378       if( _KeyDown( END ) )
01379       {
01380             DisplayGridNoVisibleToSoldierGrid( );
01381 
01382             fEndDown = TRUE;
01383       }
01384 
01385       if( !_KeyDown( END ) && fEndDown )
01386       {
01387             RemoveVisibleGridNoAtSelectedGridNo();
01388 
01389             fEndDown = FALSE;
01390       }
01391 
01392 }
01393 
01394 
01395 extern      BOOLEAN           gfDisableRegionActive;
01396 extern      BOOLEAN           gfUserTurnRegionActive;
01397 
01398 void GetKeyboardInput( UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
01399 {
01400   InputAtom                         InputEvent;
01401       BOOLEAN                                   fKeyTaken = FALSE;
01402       POINT  MousePos;
01403       //SOLDIERTYPE                       *pSoldier;
01404       static BOOLEAN    fShifted = FALSE;
01405       static BOOLEAN    fShifted2 = FALSE;
01406       static BOOLEAN    fAltDown = FALSE;
01407       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
01408       BOOLEAN                                   fGoodCheatLevelKey = FALSE;
01409 
01410       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
01411 
01412       GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos );
01413 
01414   while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
01415   {
01416             // HOOK INTO MOUSE HOOKS
01417             switch(InputEvent.usEvent)
01418         {
01419                   case LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN:
01420                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
01421                         break;
01422                   case LEFT_BUTTON_UP:
01423                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y ,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
01424                         break;
01425                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN:
01426                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
01427                         break;
01428                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_UP: 
01429                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
01430                         break;
01431 
01432         }
01433 
01434             // handle for fast help text for interface stuff
01435             if( IsTheInterfaceFastHelpTextActive() )
01436             {
01437                   if( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP )
01438                   {
01439                         ShutDownUserDefineHelpTextRegions( );
01440                   }
01441 
01442                   continue;
01443             }
01444 
01445             // Check for waiting for keyboard advance
01446             if ( gfUIWaitingForUserSpeechAdvance && InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP )
01447             {
01448                   // We have a key, advance!
01449                   DialogueAdvanceSpeech( );
01450 
01451                   // Ignore anything else
01452                   continue;
01453             }
01454 
01455             // ATE: if game paused because fo player, unpasue with any key
01456             if ( gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause && InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP )
01457             {
01458                   HandlePlayerPauseUnPauseOfGame( );
01459 
01460                   continue;
01461             }
01462 
01463             if ( (InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) )
01464             {
01465                   if ( giUIMessageOverlay != -1 )
01466                   {
01467                         EndUIMessage( );
01468                         continue;
01469                   }
01470 
01471                   // End auto bandage if we want....
01472                   if ( gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode )
01473                   {
01474                         AutoBandage( FALSE );
01475                         *puiNewEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
01476                   }
01477             }
01478 
01479             if ( gUIKeyboardHook != NULL )
01480             {
01481                   fKeyTaken = gUIKeyboardHook( &InputEvent );
01482             }
01483             if ( fKeyTaken )
01484             {
01485                   continue;
01486             }
01487 
01488             /*
01489             if( (InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == ) )
01490             {
01491                   HandlePlayerPauseUnPauseOfGame( );
01492             }
01493             */
01494 
01495     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == PAUSE ) && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV) )
01496     { 
01497                   // Pause game!
01498                   HandlePlayerPauseUnPauseOfGame( );
01499     }
01500 
01501             // FIRST DO KEYS THAT ARE USED EVERYWHERE!
01502     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == 'x') && ( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ))
01503     { 
01504                   HandleShortCutExitState( );
01505                   //*puiNewEvent = I_EXIT;
01506     }
01507 
01508             if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == ESC) )
01509             {
01510                   if ( AreInMeanwhile() && gCurrentMeanwhileDef.ubMeanwhileID != INTERROGATION )
01511                   {
01512                         DeleteTalkingMenu();
01513                         EndMeanwhile();
01514                   }
01515             }
01516 
01517 
01518             /// Allow to save everywhere
01519             if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == 'l') )
01520             {
01521                   if( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
01522                   {
01523                         if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV ) )
01524                         {
01525                               LeaveTacticalScreen( GAME_SCREEN );
01526                               DoQuickLoad();
01527                         }
01528                   }
01529                   else if( InputEvent.usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN )
01530                   {
01531                         if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV ) )
01532                         {
01533                               gfSaveGame = FALSE;
01534                               gfCameDirectlyFromGame = TRUE;
01535 
01536                               guiPreviousOptionScreen = GAME_SCREEN;
01537                               LeaveTacticalScreen( SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN );
01538                         }
01539                   }
01540             }
01541 
01542 
01543             // Break of out IN CONV...
01544             if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
01545             {
01546                   if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == ENTER ) && ( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ) )
01547                   {
01548                         if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV )
01549                         {
01550                               gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~ENGAGED_IN_CONV);
01551                               giNPCReferenceCount = 0;
01552                         }
01553                   }
01554             }
01555 
01556             if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
01557             {
01558                   {
01559                         if ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01560                         {
01561                               if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
01562                               {
01563                                     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == ENTER ) && ( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ) )
01564                                     { 
01565                                                 // ESCAPE ENEMY'S TURN              
01566                                                 EndAIDeadlock();
01567 
01568                                                 // Decrease global busy  counter...
01569                                                 gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount = 0;
01570 
01571                                                 guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
01572                                                 UIHandleLUIEndLock( NULL );
01573 
01574                                     }
01575                               }
01576                               //Madd: removed from cheat mode
01577                               if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == ENTER ) && ( InputEvent.usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN ) )
01578                               { 
01579                                     EscapeUILock( );
01580                               }
01581                         }
01582                         else
01583                         {
01584                               if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) && (InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == ENTER ) && ( InputEvent.usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN ) )
01585                               { 
01586                                           //UNLOCK UI
01587                                           EscapeUILock( );
01588                               }
01589                               else if ( (InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) && InputEvent.usParam == ENTER  )
01590                               {
01591                                           // Cycle through enemys
01592                                           CycleThroughKnownEnemies( );
01593                               }
01594                         }
01595                   }
01596             }
01597 
01598             if ( gfInTalkPanel )
01599             {
01600                   HandleTalkingMenuKeys( &InputEvent, puiNewEvent );
01601             }
01602 
01603             // Do some checks based on what mode we are in
01604             switch( gCurrentUIMode )
01605             {
01606                   case EXITSECTORMENU_MODE:
01607 
01608                         HandleSectorExitMenuKeys( &InputEvent, puiNewEvent );
01609                         continue;
01610 
01611                   case GETTINGITEM_MODE:
01612 
01613                         HandleItemMenuKeys( &InputEvent, puiNewEvent );
01614                         continue;
01615 
01616                   case MENU_MODE:
01617 
01618                         HandleMenuKeys( &InputEvent, puiNewEvent );
01619                         continue;
01620 
01621                   case OPENDOOR_MENU_MODE:
01622 
01623                         HandleOpenDoorMenuKeys( &InputEvent, puiNewEvent );
01624                         continue;
01625             }
01626 
01627 
01628             // CHECK ESC KEYS HERE....
01629     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == ESC ))
01630     { 
01631                   //EscapeUILock( );
01632 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01633                   if ( InAirRaid( ) )
01634                   {
01635                         EndAirRaid( );
01636                   }     
01637 #endif
01638 
01639             // Cancel out of spread burst...
01640                   gfBeginBurstSpreadTracking = FALSE;
01641                   gfRTClickLeftHoldIntercepted = TRUE;
01642                   if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
01643                   {
01644                         MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->fDoSpread                    = FALSE;
01645                   }
01646 
01647 
01648                   // Befone anything, delete popup box!
01649                   EndUIMessage( );
01650 
01651                   // CANCEL FROM PLANNING MODE!
01652                   if ( InUIPlanMode( ) )
01653                   {
01654                         EndUIPlan( );
01655                   }
01656 
01657                   if ( InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
01658                   {
01659                         DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
01660                   }
01661                   else if( InKeyRingPopup( ) )
01662                   {
01663                         DeleteKeyRingPopup( );
01664                   }
01665 
01666                   if ( gCurrentUIMode == MENU_MODE )
01667                   {
01668                         // If we get a hit here and we're in menu mode, quit the menu mode
01669                         EndMenuEvent( guiCurrentEvent );
01670                   }
01671 
01672                   if ( gCurrentUIMode == HANDCURSOR_MODE )
01673                   {
01674                         *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01675                   }
01676 
01677       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV ) )
01678               {
01679                     if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
01680                     {
01681                           // If soldier is not stationary, stop
01682                           StopSoldier( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] );
01683                           *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01684                     }
01685                     // ATE: OK, stop any mercs who are moving by selection method....
01686                     StopRubberBandedMercFromMoving( );
01687       }
01688 
01689     }
01690 
01691             // CHECK ESC KEYS HERE....
01692     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) && ( InputEvent.usParam == BACKSPACE ) )
01693     {
01694       StopAnyCurrentlyTalkingSpeech( );
01695     }
01696 
01697 
01698             // IF UI HAS LOCKED, ONLY ALLOW EXIT!
01699             if ( gfDisableRegionActive || gfUserTurnRegionActive )
01700             {
01701                   continue;
01702             }
01703 
01704             // Check all those we want if enemy's turn
01705     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == 'q') )
01706     { 
01707                   if ( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
01708                   {
01709                         if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
01710                         {
01711                               static BOOLEAN fShowRoofs = TRUE;
01712                               INT32 x;
01713                               UINT16 usType;
01714 
01715                               // Toggle removal of roofs...
01716                               fShowRoofs = !fShowRoofs;
01717 
01718                               for ( x = 0; x < WORLD_MAX; x++ )
01719                               {
01720                                     for ( usType = FIRSTROOF; usType <= LASTSLANTROOF; usType++ )
01721                                     {
01722                                           HideStructOfGivenType( x, usType, (BOOLEAN)(!fShowRoofs) );
01723                                     }
01724                               }
01725                               InvalidateWorldRedundency();
01726                               SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01727                         }
01728  
01729                   }
01730                   else if ( InputEvent.usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN )
01731       {
01732 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01733                         if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
01734                         {
01735                               LeaveTacticalScreen( ANIEDIT_SCREEN );
01736                         }
01737 #endif
01738       }
01739       else
01740                   {
01741                         if ( INFORMATION_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
01742                         {
01743                               *puiNewEvent = I_SOLDIERDEBUG;      
01744                         }
01745                         else
01746                         {
01747                               //if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV ) )
01748                               //    {
01749                               //          if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
01750                               //          {
01751                               //                if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && !MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->fDontChargeReadyAPs )
01752                               //                {
01753                               //                      INT16 apCost = GetAPsToReadyWeapon( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ], 0 );
01754                               //                      if (MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bActionPoints >= apCost )
01755                               //                      {
01756                               //                            DeductPoints( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ],apCost , 0 );
01757                               //                            DirtyMercPanelInterface( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ], DIRTYLEVEL2 );
01758                               //                            SoldierReadyWeapon( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] );
01759                               //                      }
01760                               //                }
01761                               //                else
01762                               //                {
01763                               //                      SoldierReadyWeapon( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] );
01764                               //                }
01765 
01766                               //          }
01767                               //    }
01768                         }
01769                   }
01770             }
01771 
01772 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01773     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == '0') && ( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ))
01774     {
01775                   INT32 i = 0;
01776                   INT16 sGridNo;
01777                   INT32 iTime = GetJA2Clock( );
01778                   UINT8 ubLevel;
01779 
01780                   for ( i = 0; i < 1000; i++ )
01781                   {
01782                         CalculateLaunchItemChanceToGetThrough( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ], &(MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->inv[ HANDPOS ] ), usMapPos, 0, 0, &sGridNo, TRUE, (INT8 *)&ubLevel, TRUE );
01783                   }
01784 
01785                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Physics 100 times: %d", ( GetJA2Clock( ) - iTime )  );
01786 
01787             }
01788 #endif
01789 
01790 
01791 #ifdef NETWORKED
01792             // DEF: Test Networking 
01793     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == '0') && ( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ))
01794     { 
01795                   DisplayMultiPlayerInfo();
01796     }
01797     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == '9') && ( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ))
01798     { 
01799                   DisplayDirectPlayInfo();
01800     }
01801     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == '8') && ( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ))
01802     { 
01803                   DisplayDirectPlayPlayerInfo();
01804     }
01805 
01806     if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( InputEvent.usParam == '7') && ( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ))
01807     { 
01808                   SetDisplayFlag();
01809     }
01810 #endif
01811 
01812             if( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
01813             {
01814                   BOOLEAN fAlt, fCtrl, fShift;
01815                   fAlt = InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ? TRUE : FALSE;
01816                   fCtrl = InputEvent.usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN ? TRUE : FALSE;
01817                   fShift = InputEvent.usKeyState & SHIFT_DOWN ? TRUE : FALSE;
01818                   switch( InputEvent.usParam )
01819                   {
01820                   case SPACE:
01821 
01822                         // nothing in hand and either not in SM panel, or the matching button is enabled if we are in SM panel
01823                         if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV )  &&
01824                               ( ( gsCurInterfacePanel != SM_PANEL ) || ( ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ NEXTMERC_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED ) ) )
01825                         {
01826                               if ( !InKeyRingPopup( ) )
01827                               {
01828                                     if ( _KeyDown( SHIFT ) )
01829                                     {
01830                                           SOLDIERTYPE *pNewSoldier;
01831                                           INT32       iCurrentSquad;
01832 
01833                                           if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
01834                                           { 
01835                                                 // only allow if nothing in hand and if in SM panel, the Change Squad button must be enabled
01836                                                 if ( 
01837                                                       ( ( gsCurInterfacePanel != TEAM_PANEL ) || ( ButtonList[ iTEAMPanelButtons[ CHANGE_SQUAD_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED ) ) )
01838                                                 {
01839                                                       //Select next squad
01840                                                       iCurrentSquad = CurrentSquad( );
01841 
01842                                                       pNewSoldier = FindNextActiveSquad( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] );
01843 
01844                                                       if ( pNewSoldier->bAssignment != iCurrentSquad )
01845                                                       {
01846                                                             HandleLocateSelectMerc( pNewSoldier->ubID, LOCATEANDSELECT_MERC );
01847 
01848                                                             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SQUAD_ACTIVE ], ( CurrentSquad( ) + 1 ) );
01849 
01850                                                             // Center to guy....
01851                                                             LocateSoldier( gusSelectedSoldier, SETLOCATOR );
01852                                                       }
01853                                                 }
01854                                           }
01855                                     }
01856                                     else
01857                                     {
01858                                           if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
01859                                           { //Select next merc
01860                                                 UINT8 bID;
01861 
01862                                                 bID = FindNextMercInTeamPanel( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ], FALSE, FALSE );
01863 
01864                                                 HandleLocateSelectMerc( bID, LOCATEANDSELECT_MERC );
01865 
01866                                                 // Center to guy....
01867                                                 LocateSoldier( gusSelectedSoldier, SETLOCATOR );
01868                                           }
01869                                     }
01870 
01871                                     *puiNewEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
01872                               }
01873                         }
01874                         break;
01875 
01876                         case TAB:
01877                               // nothing in hand and either not in SM panel, or the matching button is enabled if we are in SM panel
01878                               if ( ( gpItemPointer == NULL ) &&
01879                                            ( ( gsCurInterfacePanel != SM_PANEL ) || ( ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED ) ) )
01880                               {
01881                                     UIHandleChangeLevel( NULL );
01882 
01883                                     if ( gsCurInterfacePanel == SM_PANEL )
01884                                     {
01885                                           // Remember soldier's new value
01886                                           gpSMCurrentMerc->bUIInterfaceLevel = (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel;
01887                                     }
01888                               }
01889                               break;
01890 
01891                         case F1:
01892                               if( fShift )
01893                               {
01894                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 0, LOCATE_MERC_ONCE );
01895                               }
01896 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01897                               else if( fAlt )
01898                               {
01899                                     TestMeanWhile( 15 );
01900                               }
01901                               else if( fCtrl )
01902                               {
01903                                     TestMeanWhile( 10 );
01904                               }
01905 #endif
01906                               else
01907                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 0, LOCATEANDSELECT_MERC );
01908                               break;
01909                         case F2:
01910                               if( fShift )
01911                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 1, LOCATE_MERC_ONCE );
01912 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01913                               else if( fAlt )
01914                               {
01915                                     TestMeanWhile( 1 );
01916                               }
01917                               else if( fCtrl )
01918                               {
01919                                     TestMeanWhile( 11 );
01920                               }
01921 #endif
01922                               else
01923                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 1, LOCATEANDSELECT_MERC );
01924                               break;
01925                         case F3:
01926                               if( fShift )
01927                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 2, LOCATE_MERC_ONCE );
01928 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01929                               else if( fAlt )
01930                               {
01931                                     TestMeanWhile( 2 );
01932                               }
01933                               else if( fCtrl )
01934                               {
01935                                     TestMeanWhile( 12 );
01936                               }
01937 #endif
01938                               else
01939                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 2, LOCATEANDSELECT_MERC );
01940                               break;
01941                         case F4:
01942                               if( fShift )
01943                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 3, LOCATE_MERC_ONCE );
01944 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01945                               else if( fAlt )
01946                               {
01947                                     TestMeanWhile( 3 );
01948                               }
01949                               else if( fCtrl )
01950                               {
01951                                     TestMeanWhile( 13 );
01952                               }
01953 #endif
01954                               else
01955                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 3, LOCATEANDSELECT_MERC );
01956                               break;
01957                         case F5:
01958                               if( fShift )
01959                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 4, LOCATE_MERC_ONCE );
01960 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01961                               else if( fAlt )
01962                               {
01963                                     TestMeanWhile( 4 );
01964                               }
01965                               else if( fCtrl )
01966                               {
01967                                     TestMeanWhile( 14 );
01968                               }
01969 #endif
01970                               else
01971                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 4, LOCATEANDSELECT_MERC );
01972                               break;
01973                         case F6:
01974                               if( fShift )
01975                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 5, LOCATE_MERC_ONCE );
01976 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01977                               else if( fAlt )
01978                               {
01979                                     TestMeanWhile( 5 );
01980                               }
01981                               else if( fCtrl )
01982                               {
01983                                     TestMeanWhile( 15 );
01984                               }
01985 #endif
01986                               else
01987                                     HandleSelectMercSlot( 5, LOCATEANDSELECT_MERC );
01988                               break;
01989 
01990 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01991                         case F7:
01992                               if( fAlt )
01993                               {
01994                                     TestMeanWhile( 16 );
01995                               }
01996                               break;
01997                         case F8:
01998 
01999                               if( fAlt )
02000                               {
02001                                     TestMeanWhile( 7 );
02002                               }
02003                               break;
02004 
02005                         case F9:
02006 
02007                               if( fCtrl )
02008                               {
02009                                     TestMeanWhile( 8 );
02010                               }
02011                               else
02012                               {
02013                                     #ifdef JA2EDITOR

03278                                     {
03279                                           for ( UINT32 uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumWorldItems; uiLoop++ )                                                                      
03280                                           {
03281                                                 if ( ( gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].fExists) && (gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE) )//item exists and is reachable
03282                                                 {
03283                                                       //find out how many items can be put in a big slot
03284                                                       INT8 ubSlotLimit = ItemSlotLimit( gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].o.usItem, BIGPOCK1POS );
03285 
03286                                                       //if we still have some space
03287                                                       INT32 i = 0;
03288                                                       while ( gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].o.ubNumberOfObjects < ubSlotLimit )
03289                                                       {
03290                                                             i++;
03291                                                             //if the next item is the same
03292                                                             if ( gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].o.usItem == gWorldItems[ uiLoop + i ].o.usItem )
03293                                                             {
03294                                                                   INT8 ubObjCount = ubSlotLimit - gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].o.ubNumberOfObjects;                                                          
03295                                                                   INT8 bPointsToMove = __min( ubObjCount, gWorldItems[ uiLoop + i ].o.ubNumberOfObjects );
03296 
03297                                                                   StackObjs( &(gWorldItems[ uiLoop + i ].o), &(gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].o), bPointsToMove);
03298                                                                   
03299                                                             }
03300                                                             else
03301                                                             {
03302                                                                   break;
03303                                                             }
03304                                                       }
03305                                                 }
03306                                           }
03307                                     }

03311                         case 's':
03312 
03313                               if( fCtrl )
03314                               {
03315                                     if ( fAlt )
03316                                           RemoveCharacterFromSquads(MercPtrs[gusSelectedSoldier]);
03317 
03318                                     else if( !fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV ) )
03319                                     {
03320                                           //if the game CAN be saved
03321                                           if( CanGameBeSaved() )
03322                                           {
03323                                                 gfSaveGame = TRUE;
03324                                                 gfCameDirectlyFromGame = TRUE;
03325 
03326                                                 guiPreviousOptionScreen = GAME_SCREEN;
03327                                                 LeaveTacticalScreen( SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN );
03328                                           }
03329                                           else
03330                                           {
03331                                                 //Display a message saying the player cant save now
03332                                                 DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zNewTacticalMessages[ TCTL_MSG__IRON_MAN_CANT_SAVE_NOW ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL);
03333                                           }
03334                                     }
03335                               }
03336                               else 
03337                               if( fAlt )
03338                               {
03339                                     if( !fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV ) )
03340                                     {
03341                                           //if the game CAN be saved
03342                                           if( CanGameBeSaved() )
03343                                           {
03344                                                 guiPreviousOptionScreen = GAME_SCREEN;
03345                                                 //guiPreviousOptionScreen = guiCurrentScreen;
03346                                                 DoQuickSave();
03347                                           }
03348                                           else
