03350                                                 //Display a message saying the player cant save now
03351                                                 DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zNewTacticalMessages[ TCTL_MSG__IRON_MAN_CANT_SAVE_NOW ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
03352                                           }
03353                                     }
03354                               }
03355                               else if( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
03356                               {
03357                                     gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
03358                                     HandleStanceChangeFromUIKeys( ANIM_STAND );
03359                               }
03360                               break;
03361 
03362                         case 't':
03363 
03364                               if( fAlt )
03365                               {
03366                                     if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
03367                                     {
03368                                           TeleportSelectedSoldier();                            
03369                                     }
03370                               }
03371                               else if( fCtrl )
03372                               {
03373                                     if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
03374                                     {
03375                                           TestCapture( );
03376 
03377                                           //EnterCombatMode( gbPlayerNum );
03378                                     }
03379                               }
03380                               else
03381                                     ToggleTreeTops();
03382                               break;
03383 
03384 
03385         case '=':
03386                               //if the display cover or line of sight is being displayed
03387                               if( _KeyDown( END ) || _KeyDown( DEL ) )
03388                               {
03389                                     if( _KeyDown( DEL ) )
03390                                           ChangeSizeOfDisplayCover( gGameSettings.ubSizeOfDisplayCover + 1 );
03391 
03392                                     if( _KeyDown( END ) )
03393                                           ChangeSizeOfLOS( gGameSettings.ubSizeOfLOS + 1 );
03394                               }
03395                               else
03396                               {
03397 
03398                                     #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03399                                           if( fAlt )
03400                                           {
03401                                                 WarpGameTime( 60, TRUE );
03402                                                 break;
03403                                           }
03404                                     #endif
03405 
03406                                             // ATE: This key will select everybody in the sector
03407                                             if (! (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
03408                                             {
03409                                                   SOLDIERTYPE *         pSoldier;
03410                                                   INT32                                   cnt;
03411 
03412                                                   cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
03413                                                   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
03414                                                   {
03415 
03416                                                         // Check if this guy is OK to control....
03417                                                         if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pSoldier ) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_VEHICLE | SOLDIER_PASSENGER | SOLDIER_DRIVER ) ) )
03418                                                         {
03419                                                             pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED;
03420                                                   }
03421                                                 }
03422                                                 EndMultiSoldierSelection( TRUE );
03423                                             }
03424                               }
03425                               break;
03426 
03427                         case 'u':
03428 
03429                               if( fAlt )
03430                               {
03431                                     if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
03432                                     {
03433                                           RefreshSoldier();
03434                                     }
03435                               }
03436                               else if( fCtrl )
03437                               {
03438                                     INT32 cnt;
03439                                     SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
03440 
03441 #ifdef GERMAN
03442                                     if ( gubCheatLevel == 2 )
03443                                     {
03444                                           fGoodCheatLevelKey = TRUE;
03445                                           gubCheatLevel++;
03446                                     }
03447                                     else
03448                                     {
03449                                           RESET_CHEAT_LEVEL();
03450                                     }
03451 #endif
03452 
03453                                     if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) && gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
03454                                     {
03455                                           for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gbPlayerNum ], cnt = 0; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
03456                                           {     
03457                                                 if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife > 0 )
03458                                                 {
03459                                                       // Get breath back
03460                                                       pSoldier->bBreath                                           = pSoldier->bBreathMax;
03461 
03462                                                       // Get life back
03463                                                       pSoldier->bLife                                                   = pSoldier->bLifeMax;
03464                                                       pSoldier->bBleeding                                         = 0;
03465 
03466                                                       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
03467                                                 }
03468                                           }
03469                                     }
03470                               }
03471 
03472                               else if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
03473                                     *puiNewEvent = M_CHANGE_TO_ACTION;
03474                               break;
03475 
03476                         case 'v':
03477                               if( fAlt )
03478                               {
03479 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03480                                     if( gfDoVideoScroll ^= TRUE )
03481                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Video Scroll ON"  );
03482                                     else
03483                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Video Scroll OFF"  );
03484 #endif
03485                               }
03486                               else if( fCtrl )
03487                               {
03488                                     #ifdef SGP_VIDEO_DEBUGGING
03489                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"VObjects:  %d", guiVObjectSize );
03490                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"VSurfaces:  %d", guiVSurfaceSize );
03491                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"SGPVideoDump.txt updated..." );
03492                                           PerformVideoInfoDumpIntoFile( "SGPVideoDump.txt", TRUE );
03493                                     #endif
03494                               }
03495                               else
03496                                     DisplayGameSettings( );
03497 
03498                               break;
03499                         case 'w':
03500                         case 'W':
03501 
03502                               if( fAlt )
03503                               {
03504                                     if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
03505                                     {
03506                                           if ( InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
03507                                           {
03508                                                 // Swap item in description panel...
03509                                                 CycleItemDescriptionItem( );
03510 
03511                                           }
03512                                           else
03513                                           {
03514                                                 CycleSelectedMercsItem();
03515                                           }
03516                                     }
03517                               }
03518                               else if( fCtrl )
03519                               {
03520                                     if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
03521                                     {
03522                                           if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
03523                                           {
03524                                                 CreateItem( FLAMETHROWER, 100, &( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->inv[ HANDPOS ]) );
03525                                           }
03526                                     }
03527                               }
03528                               else 
03529                                     ToggleWireFrame();
03530                               break;
03531 
03532                         case 'y':
03533                               if( fAlt )
03534                               {
03535                                     OBJECTTYPE        Object;
03536                                     SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
03537 
03538                                     if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
03539                                     {
03540                                           QuickCreateProfileMerc( CIV_TEAM, MARIA ); //Ira
03541 
03542                                           // Recruit!
03543                                           RecruitEPC( MARIA );
03544                                     }
03545 
03546                                     // Create object and set
03547                                     CreateItem( (UINT16) G41, 100, &Object );
03548 
03549                             pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ROBOT, FALSE );
03550 
03551                                     AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &Object, FALSE );
03552 
03553                               }
03554                               else
03555                               {
03556                                     if ( INFORMATION_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
03557                                     {
03558                                           *puiNewEvent = I_LOSDEBUG;
03559                                     }
03560                               }
03561                               //else if( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
03562                               break;
03563                         case 'z':
03564                               if( fCtrl )
03565                               {
03566                                     if ( INFORMATION_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
03567                                     {
03568                                           ToggleZBuffer();
03569                                     }
03570                               }
03571                               else if ( fAlt )
03572                               {
03573                                     // Toggle squad's stealth mode.....
03574                                     // For each guy on squad...
03575                                     {
03576                                           SOLDIERTYPE                   *pTeamSoldier;
03577                                           INT8                                      bLoop;
03578                                           BOOLEAN                                   fStealthOn = FALSE;
03579 
03580                                           // Check if at least one guy is on stealth....
03581                                           for (bLoop=gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].bFirstID, pTeamSoldier=MercPtrs[bLoop]; bLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].bLastID; bLoop++, pTeamSoldier++)
03582                                           {
03583                                                 if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pTeamSoldier->bAssignment == CurrentSquad( ) )
03584                                                 {     
03585                                                       if ( pTeamSoldier->bStealthMode )
03586                                                       {
03587                                                             fStealthOn = TRUE;
03588                                                       }
03589                                                 }
03590                                           }
03591 
03592                                           fStealthOn = !fStealthOn;
03593 
03594                                           for (bLoop=gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].bFirstID, pTeamSoldier=MercPtrs[bLoop]; bLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].bLastID; bLoop++, pTeamSoldier++)
03595                                           {
03596                                                 if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pTeamSoldier->bAssignment == CurrentSquad( ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) )
03597                                                 {     
03598                                                       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc != NULL && bLoop == gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID )
03599                                                       {
03600                                                             gfUIStanceDifferent = TRUE;
03601                                                       }
03602 
03603                                                       pTeamSoldier->bStealthMode = fStealthOn;
03604                                                 }
03605                                           }
03606 
03607                                           fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
03608 
03609                                           // OK, display message
03610                                           if ( fStealthOn )
03611                                           {
03612                                                 ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SQUAD_ON_STEALTHMODE ] );
03613                                           }
03614                                           else
03615                                           {
03616                                                 ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SQUAD_OFF_STEALTHMODE ] );
03617                                           }
03618                                     }
03619                               }
03620                               else
03621                               {
03622                                     // nothing in hand and either not in SM panel, or the matching button is enabled if we are in SM panel
03623                                     if ( ( gpItemPointer == NULL ) )
03624                                     {
03625                                           HandleStealthChangeFromUIKeys( );
03626                                     }
03627                               }
03628                               break;
03629 
03630                         case '-':
03631                         case '_':
03632                               //if the display cover or line of sight is being displayed
03633                               if( _KeyDown( END ) || _KeyDown( DEL ) )
03634                               {
03635                                     if( _KeyDown( DEL ) )
03636                                           ChangeSizeOfDisplayCover( gGameSettings.ubSizeOfDisplayCover - 1 );
03637 
03638                                     if( _KeyDown( END ) )
03639                                           ChangeSizeOfLOS( gGameSettings.ubSizeOfLOS - 1 );
03640                               }
03641                               else
03642                               {
03643                                     if( fAlt )
03644                                     {
03645                                           if(MusicGetVolume() >= 20)
03646                                                 MusicSetVolume(MusicGetVolume()-20);
03647                                           else
03648                                                 MusicSetVolume(0);
03649                                     }
03650                                     else if( fCtrl )
03651                                     {
03652       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03653                                           gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed = max( 1, gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed - 1 );
03654                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Decreasing Realtime speed to %d", gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed );
03655       #endif
03656                                     }
03657                                     else
03658                                     {
03659       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03660                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Using Normal Scroll Speed"  );
03661                                           gubCurScrollSpeedID = 1;
03662       #endif
03663                                     }
03664                               }
03665                               break;
03666                         case '+':
03667 
03668 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03669                               if( fAlt )
03670                               {
03671                                     if(MusicGetVolume() <= 107)
03672                                           MusicSetVolume(MusicGetVolume()+20);
03673                                     else
03674                                           MusicSetVolume(127);                      
03675                               }
03676                               else if( fCtrl )
03677                               {
03678                                     gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed = min( MAX_REALTIME_SPEED_VAL, gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed+1 );
03679                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Increasing Realtime speed to %d", gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed );
03680                               }
03681                               else 
03682                               {
03683                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Using Higher Scroll Speed"  );
03684                                     gubCurScrollSpeedID = 2;
03685                               }
03686 #endif
03687                               break;
03688                         case '`':
03689                               
03690                               // Switch panels...
03691                               {
03692                                     ToggleTacticalPanels();
03693 
03694                                     if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
03695             {
03696               //EnvBeginRainStorm( 1 );
03697             }
03698 
03699                               }
03700                               break;
03701 
03702                   }
03703 
03704 #ifdef GERMAN
03705                   if ( !fGoodCheatLevelKey && gubCheatLevel < 5 )
03706                   {
03707                         RESET_CHEAT_LEVEL( );
03708                   }
03709 #else
03710                   if ( !fGoodCheatLevelKey && gubCheatLevel < 4 )
03711                   {
03712                         RESET_CHEAT_LEVEL( );
03713                   }
03714 #endif
03715 
03716             }
03717       }
03718 }

03720 
03721 void HandleTalkingMenuKeys( InputAtom *pInputEvent, UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
03722 {
03723       // CHECK ESC KEYS HERE....
03724       if ( pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_UP )
03725       {
03726             if ( pInputEvent->usParam == ESC )
03727             { 
03728                   //Handle esc in talking menu
03729                   if ( HandleTalkingMenuEscape( TRUE, TRUE ) )
03730                   {
03731                         *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
03732                   }
03733             }
03734             else if ( pInputEvent->usParam == BACKSPACE )
03735             {
03736                   HandleTalkingMenuBackspace();
03737             }
03738 
03739       }
03740 }
03741 
03742 void HandleSectorExitMenuKeys( InputAtom *pInputEvent, UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
03743 {
03744       // CHECK ESC KEYS HERE....
03745   if ( ( pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_UP )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == ESC ))
03746   { 
03747             //Handle esc in talking menu
03748             RemoveSectorExitMenu( FALSE );
03749 
03750             *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
03751       }
03752 }
03753 
03754 
03755 void HandleOpenDoorMenuKeys( InputAtom *pInputEvent, UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
03756 {
03757       // CHECK ESC KEYS HERE....
03758   if ( ( pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_UP )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == ESC ))
03759   { 
03760             //Handle esc in talking menu
03761             CancelOpenDoorMenu( );
03762             HandleOpenDoorMenu( );
03763             *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
03764       }
03765 }
03766 
03767 
03768 void HandleMenuKeys( InputAtom *pInputEvent, UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
03769 {
03770       // CHECK ESC KEYS HERE....
03771   if ( ( pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_UP )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == ESC ))
03772   { 
03773             //Handle esc in talking menu
03774             CancelMovementMenu( );
03775             
03776             *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
03777       }
03778 }
03779 
03780 void HandleItemMenuKeys( InputAtom *pInputEvent, UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
03781 {
03782       // CHECK ESC KEYS HERE....
03783   if ( ( pInputEvent->usEvent == KEY_UP )&& ( pInputEvent->usParam == ESC ))
03784   { 
03785             //Handle esc in talking menu
03786             RemoveItemPickupMenu( );
03787             *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
03788       }
03789 }
03790 
03791 BOOLEAN HandleCheckForExitArrowsInput( BOOLEAN fAdjustConfirm )
03792 {
03793       INT16 sMapPos;
03794 
03795       // If not in move mode, return!
03796       if ( gCurrentUIMode != MOVE_MODE )
03797       {
03798             return( FALSE );
03799       }
03800 
03801       if ( gusSelectedSoldier == NOBODY )
03802       {
03803             return( FALSE );
03804       }
03805 
03806       // ATE: Remove confirm for exit arrows...
03807       fAdjustConfirm = TRUE;
03808       gfUIConfirmExitArrows = TRUE;
03809 
03810 
03811       //Return right away, saying that we are in this mode, don't do any normal stuff!
03812       if ( guiCurrentUICursor == NOEXIT_EAST_UICURSOR || guiCurrentUICursor == NOEXIT_WEST_UICURSOR
03813               || guiCurrentUICursor == NOEXIT_NORTH_UICURSOR || guiCurrentUICursor == NOEXIT_SOUTH_UICURSOR ||
03814                          guiCurrentUICursor == NOEXIT_GRID_UICURSOR )
03815       {
03816             // Yeah, but add a message....
03817             if( gfInvalidTraversal )
03818             {
03819                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ CANNOT_LEAVE_SECTOR_FROM_SIDE_STR ] );
03820                   gfInvalidTraversal = FALSE;
03821             }
03822             else if( gfRobotWithoutControllerAttemptingTraversal )
03823             {
03824                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, gzLateLocalizedString[ 1 ] );
03825                   gfRobotWithoutControllerAttemptingTraversal = FALSE;
03826             }
03827             else if( gfLoneEPCAttemptingTraversal )
03828             {
03829                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_ESCORTED_CHARACTERS_CANT_LEAVE_SECTOR_ALONE_STR ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name );
03830                   gfLoneEPCAttemptingTraversal = FALSE;
03831             }
03832             else if( gubLoneMercAttemptingToAbandonEPCs )
03833             {
03834                   UINT16 str[256];
03835                   if( gubLoneMercAttemptingToAbandonEPCs == 1 )
03836                   { //Use the singular version of the string
03837                         if( gMercProfiles[ MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->ubProfile ].bSex == MALE )
03838                         { //male singular
03839                               swprintf( str, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MERC_CANT_ISOLATE_EPC_HELPTEXT_MALE_SINGULAR ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name, 
03840                                                             MercPtrs[ gbPotentiallyAbandonedEPCSlotID ]->name );
03841                         }
03842                         else
03843                         { //female singular
03844                               swprintf( str, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MERC_CANT_ISOLATE_EPC_HELPTEXT_FEMALE_SINGULAR ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name, 
03845                                                             MercPtrs[ gbPotentiallyAbandonedEPCSlotID ]->name );
03846                         }
03847                   }
03848                   else
03849                   { //Use the plural version of the string
03850                         if( gMercProfiles[ MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->ubProfile ].bSex == MALE )
03851                         { //male plural
03852                               swprintf( str, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MERC_CANT_ISOLATE_EPC_HELPTEXT_MALE_PLURAL ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name );
03853                         }
03854                         else
03855                         { //female plural
03856                               swprintf( str, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MERC_CANT_ISOLATE_EPC_HELPTEXT_FEMALE_PLURAL ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name );
03857                         }
03858                   }
03859                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, str );
03860                   gubLoneMercAttemptingToAbandonEPCs = FALSE;
03861             }
03862             else
03863             {
03864                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ MERC_IS_TOO_FAR_AWAY_STR ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name );
03865             }
03866             
03867             return( TRUE );
03868       }
03869 
03870       // Check if we want to exit!
03871       if ( guiCurrentUICursor == EXIT_GRID_UICURSOR || guiCurrentUICursor == CONFIRM_EXIT_GRID_UICURSOR  )
03872       {
03873             if ( fAdjustConfirm )
03874             {
03875                   if ( !gfUIConfirmExitArrows )
03876                   {
03877                         gfUIConfirmExitArrows = TRUE;
03878                   }
03879                   else
03880                   {
03881                         if ( !GetMouseMapPos( &sMapPos ) )
03882                         {
03883                               return( FALSE );
03884                         }
03885 
03886                         // Goto next sector
03887                         //SimulateMouseMovement( gusMouseXPos - 5, gusMouseYPos );
03888                         InitSectorExitMenu( DIRECTION_EXITGRID, sMapPos );
03889                   }
03890             }
03891             return( TRUE );
03892       }
03893 
03894       // Check if we want to exit!
03895       if ( guiCurrentUICursor == EXIT_EAST_UICURSOR || guiCurrentUICursor == CONFIRM_EXIT_EAST_UICURSOR  )
03896       {
03897             if ( fAdjustConfirm )
03898             {
03899                   if ( !gfUIConfirmExitArrows )
03900                   {
03901                         gfUIConfirmExitArrows = TRUE;
03902                   }
03903                   else
03904                   {
03905                         // Goto next sector
03906                         //SimulateMouseMovement( gusMouseXPos - 5, gusMouseYPos );
03907                         InitSectorExitMenu( EAST, 0 );
03908                   }
03909             }
03910             return( TRUE );
03911       }
03912       if ( guiCurrentUICursor == EXIT_WEST_UICURSOR || guiCurrentUICursor == CONFIRM_EXIT_WEST_UICURSOR  )
03913       {
03914             if ( fAdjustConfirm )
03915             {
03916                   if ( !gfUIConfirmExitArrows )
03917                   {
03918                         gfUIConfirmExitArrows = TRUE;
03919                   }
03920                   else
03921                   {
03922                         // Goto next sector
03923                         //SimulateMouseMovement( gusMouseXPos + 5, gusMouseYPos );
03924                         InitSectorExitMenu( WEST, 0);
03925                   }
03926             }
03927             return( TRUE );
03928       }
03929       if ( guiCurrentUICursor == EXIT_NORTH_UICURSOR || guiCurrentUICursor == CONFIRM_EXIT_NORTH_UICURSOR )
03930       {
03931             if ( fAdjustConfirm )
03932             {
03933                   if ( !gfUIConfirmExitArrows )
03934                   {
03935                         gfUIConfirmExitArrows = TRUE;
03936                   }
03937                   else
03938                   {
03939                         // Goto next sector
03940                         //SimulateMouseMovement( gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos + 5 );
03941                         InitSectorExitMenu( NORTH , 0);
03942                   }
03943             }
03944             return( TRUE );
03945       }
03946       if ( guiCurrentUICursor == EXIT_SOUTH_UICURSOR || guiCurrentUICursor == CONFIRM_EXIT_SOUTH_UICURSOR )
03947       {
03948             if ( fAdjustConfirm )
03949             {
03950                   if ( !gfUIConfirmExitArrows )
03951                   {
03952                         gfUIConfirmExitArrows = TRUE;
03953                   }
03954                   else
03955                   {
03956                         // Goto next sector
03957                         //SimulateMouseMovement( gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos - 5);
03958                         InitSectorExitMenu( SOUTH, 0 );
03959                   }
03960             }
03961             return( TRUE );
03962       }
03963       return( FALSE );
03964 }

03969 void CreateRandomItem()
03970 {
03971       OBJECTTYPE        Object;
03972       UINT16 usMapPos;
03973       if ( GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos ) )
03974       {
03975             CreateItem( (UINT16) (Random( 35 ) + 1), 100, &Object );
03976             AddItemToPool( usMapPos, &Object, -1 , 0, 0, 0 );
03977       }
03978 }

03980 void MakeSelectedSoldierTired()
03981 {
03982       // Key to make guy get tired!
03983       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
03984       OBJECTTYPE        Object;
03985       UINT16 usMapPos;
03986       if ( GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos ) )
03987       {
03988             CreateItem( (UINT16)TNT, 100, &Object );
03989             AddItemToPool( usMapPos, &Object, -1, 0, 0, 0 );
03990       }
03991 
03992       // CHECK IF WE'RE ON A GUY ( EITHER SELECTED, OURS, OR THEIRS
03993       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
03994       {
03995             // Get Soldier
03996             GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusUIFullTargetID );
03997 
03998             //FatigueCharacter( pSoldier );
03999 
04000             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
04001       }
04002 }
04003 
04004 void ToggleRealTime( UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
04005 { 
04006       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED )
04007       {
04008             // Change to real-time
04009             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~TURNBASED);
04010             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= REALTIME;
04011 
04012             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Switching to Realtime." );
04013       }
04014       else if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME )
04015       {
04016             // Change to turn-based
04017             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= TURNBASED;
04018             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &=( ~REALTIME );
04019 
04020             *puiNewEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
04021 
04022             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Switching to Turnbased." );
04023       }
04024       
04025       // Plot new path!
04026       gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
04027 }
04028 
04029 void ToggleViewAllMercs()
04030 {
04031       // Set option to show all mercs
04032       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&SHOW_ALL_MERCS )
04033       {
04034             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&= (~SHOW_ALL_MERCS );
04035       }
04036       else
04037       {
04038             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags|= SHOW_ALL_MERCS;
04039       }
04040 
04041       // RE-RENDER
04042       SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
04043 }
04044 
04045 void ToggleViewAllItems()
04046 {
04047       // Set option to show all mercs
04048       if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SHOW_ALL_ITEMS )
04049       {
04050             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~SHOW_ALL_ITEMS ;
04051       }
04052       else
04053       {
04054             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= SHOW_ALL_ITEMS;
04055       }
04056 
04057       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_GLOW_ITEMS ] ) 
04058       {
04059             ToggleItemGlow( TRUE );
04060       }
04061       else
04062       {
04063             ToggleItemGlow( FALSE );
04064       }
04065 
04066       // RE-RENDER
04067       SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
04068 }

04070 void TestExplosion()
04071 {
04072       UINT16 usMapPos;
04073       if ( GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos ) )
04074       {
04075             EXPLOSION_PARAMS  ExpParams ;
04076             ExpParams.uiFlags             = 0;
04077             ExpParams.ubOwner             = NOBODY;
04078             ExpParams.ubTypeID            = STUN_BLAST;
04079             ExpParams.sGridNo             = usMapPos;
04080 
04081             GenerateExplosion( &ExpParams );
04082 
04083             PlayJA2Sample( EXPLOSION_1, RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04084       }
04085 }
04086 
04087 void CycleSelectedMercsItem()
04088 {
04089       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CycleSelectedMercsItem"));
04090       UINT16 usOldItem;
04091       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04092       // Cycle selected guy's item...
04093       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04094       {
04095             // Get soldier...
04096             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
04097             
04098             usOldItem = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
04099 
04100             usOldItem++;
04101 
04102             if ( usOldItem > MAXITEMS ) 
04103             {
04104                   usOldItem = 0;
04105             }
04106 
04107             CreateItem( (UINT16)usOldItem, 100, &( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]) );
04108             
04109             DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
04110 
04111       }
04112 }
04113 
04114 void ToggleWireFrame()
04115 {
04116       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TOGGLE_WIREFRAME ] )
04117       {
04118             gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TOGGLE_WIREFRAME ] = FALSE;
04119 
04120             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_WIREFRAMES_REMOVED ] );
04121       }
04122       else
04123       {
04124             gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TOGGLE_WIREFRAME ] = TRUE;
04125 
04126             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_WIREFRAMES_ADDED ] );
04127       }
04128 
04129       SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
04130 }
04131 
04132 void RefreshSoldier()
04133 {
04134       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04135       UINT16 usMapPos;
04136       // CHECK IF WE'RE ON A GUY ( EITHER SELECTED, OURS, OR THEIRS
04137       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04138       {
04139             // Get Soldier
04140             GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusUIFullTargetID );
04141 
04142             ReviveSoldier( pSoldier );
04143 
04144       }
04145 
04146       if ( GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos ) )
04147             sprintf( (char *)gDebugStr, "%d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d", gubWorldMovementCosts[ usMapPos ][ 0 ][ 0 ],
04148                   gubWorldMovementCosts[ usMapPos ][ 1 ][gsInterfaceLevel],
04149                   gubWorldMovementCosts[ usMapPos ][ 2 ][gsInterfaceLevel],
04150                   gubWorldMovementCosts[ usMapPos ][ 3 ][gsInterfaceLevel],
04151                   gubWorldMovementCosts[ usMapPos ][ 4 ][gsInterfaceLevel],
04152                   gubWorldMovementCosts[ usMapPos ][ 5 ][gsInterfaceLevel],
04153                   gubWorldMovementCosts[ usMapPos ][ 6 ][gsInterfaceLevel],
04154                   gubWorldMovementCosts[ usMapPos ][ 7 ][gsInterfaceLevel] );
04155 }
04156 
04157 void ChangeSoldiersBodyType( UINT8 ubBodyType, BOOLEAN fCreateNewPalette )
04158 {
04159       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04160       if( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
04161       {
04162             if( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
04163             {
04164                   pSoldier->ubBodyType = ubBodyType;
04165                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STANDING, 0 , TRUE );
04166                   //SetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
04167                   if( fCreateNewPalette )
04168                   {
04169                         CreateSoldierPalettes( pSoldier );
04170 
04171                         switch( ubBodyType )
04172                         {
04173                               case ADULTFEMALEMONSTER:
04174                               case AM_MONSTER:
04175                               case YAF_MONSTER:
04176                               case YAM_MONSTER:
04177                               case LARVAE_MONSTER:
04178                               case INFANT_MONSTER:
04179                               case QUEENMONSTER:
04180 
04181                                     pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_MONSTER;
04182                                     memset( &(pSoldier->inv), 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) * NUM_INV_SLOTS );
04183                                     AssignCreatureInventory( pSoldier );
04184                                     CreateItem( CREATURE_YOUNG_MALE_SPIT,           100, &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) );
04185 
04186                                     break;
04187 
04188                               case TANK_NW:
04189                               case TANK_NE:
04190 
04191                                     pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_VEHICLE;
04192                                     //pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem = TANK_CANNON;
04193                                     
04194                                     pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem = MINIMI;
04195                                     pSoldier->bVehicleID = (INT8)AddVehicleToList( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ, HUMMER );
04196 
04197                                     break;
04198                         }
04199 
04200                   }
04201             }
04202       }
04203 }
04204 
04205 void TeleportSelectedSoldier()
04206 {
04207       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04208       UINT16 usMapPos;
04209       // CHECK IF WE'RE ON A GUY ( EITHER SELECTED, OURS, OR THEIRS
04210       if( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
04211       {
04212             if ( GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos ) )
04213             {
04214                   // Check level first....
04215                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel == 0 )
04216                   {
04217                         SetSoldierHeight( pSoldier, 0 );
04218                         TeleportSoldier( pSoldier, usMapPos, FALSE );
04219                         EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
04220                   }
04221                   else
04222                   {
04223                         // Is there a roof?
04224                         if ( FindStructure( usMapPos, STRUCTURE_ROOF ) != NULL )
04225                         {
04226                               SetSoldierHeight( pSoldier, 50.0 );
04227                               
04228                               TeleportSoldier( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE );
04229                               EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
04230                         }
04231                   }
04232             }
04233       }
04234 }
04235

04238 void ToggleTreeTops()
04239 {
04240       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TOGGLE_TREE_TOPS ] )
04241       {
04242             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ REMOVING_TREETOPS_STR ] );
04243             WorldHideTrees( );
04244             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= NOHIDE_REDUNDENCY;
04245       }
04246       else
04247       {
04248             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ SHOWING_TREETOPS_STR ]);
04249             WorldShowTrees( );
04250             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~NOHIDE_REDUNDENCY);
04251       }
04252       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TOGGLE_TREE_TOPS ] = !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TOGGLE_TREE_TOPS ];
04253 
04254       // FOR THE NEXT RENDER LOOP, RE-EVALUATE REDUNDENT TILES
04255       InvalidateWorldRedundency( );
04256 }

04259 {
04260       // Set option to show all mercs

04271 
04272 void TogglePlanningMode()
04273 {
04274       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04275       UINT16 usMapPos;
04276       // DO ONLY IN TURNED BASED!
04277       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
04278       {
04279             // CANCEL FROM PLANNING MODE!
04280             if ( InUIPlanMode( ) )
04281             {
04282                   EndUIPlan( );
04283             }
04284             else if ( GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos ) )
04285             {
04286                   switch( gCurrentUIMode )
04287                   {
04288                         case MOVE_MODE:
04289                               if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
04290                               {
04291                                     GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier );
04292                                     BeginUIPlan( pSoldier );
04293                                     AddUIPlan( usMapPos, UIPLAN_ACTION_MOVETO );
04294                               }
04295                               break;
04296                         case ACTION_MODE:
04297                               if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
04298                               {
04299                                     GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier );
04300                                     BeginUIPlan( pSoldier );
04301                                     AddUIPlan( usMapPos, UIPLAN_ACTION_FIRE );
04302                               }
04303                               break;
04304                   }
04305             }
04306       }
04307 }
04308 
04309 void SetBurstMode()
04310 {
04311       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
04312       {
04313             ChangeWeaponMode( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] );
04314       }
04315 }

04317 void ObliterateSector()
04318 {
04319       INT32 cnt;
04320       SOLDIERTYPE *pTSoldier;
04321 
04322       // Kill everybody!
04323       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID + 1;
04324 
04325       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
04326             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Obliterating Sector!" );
04327       #endif
04328 
04329       for ( pTSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS; pTSoldier++, cnt++ )
04330       {
04331             if ( pTSoldier->bActive && !pTSoldier->bNeutral && (pTSoldier->bSide != gbPlayerNum ) )
04332             {
04333                         //    ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
04334                   //          memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
04335                   //          AniParams.sGridNo                                     = pTSoldier->sGridNo;
04336                   //          AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
04337                   //    AniParams.usTileType                        = FIRSTEXPLOSION;
04338                         //    AniParams.usTileIndex                           = FIRSTEXPLOSION1;
04339                         //    AniParams.sDelay                                      = 80;
04340                         //    AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
04341                         //    AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_FORWARD;
04342 
04343                         //    CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
04344                               //PlayJA2Sample( EXPLOSION_1, RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04345 
04346                               EVENT_SoldierGotHit( pTSoldier, 0, 400, 0, pTSoldier->bDirection, 320, NOBODY , FIRE_WEAPON_NO_SPECIAL, pTSoldier->bAimShotLocation, 0, NOWHERE );
04347             }
04348       }
04349 }

04351 void RandomizeMercProfile()
04352 {
04353       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04354       // Get selected soldier
04355       if    ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
04356       {
04357             // Change guy!
04358             ForceSoldierProfileID( pSoldier, (UINT8)Random( 30 ) );
04359 
04360             // Dirty interface
04361             DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
04362       }
04363 }

04365 void JumpFence()
04366 {
04367       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04368       INT8                                      bDirection;
04369       if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
04370       {
04371             if ( FindFenceJumpDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection, &bDirection ) )
04372             {
04373                   BeginSoldierClimbFence( pSoldier );
04374             }
04375       }
04376 }                 
04377 
04378 void CreateNextCivType()
04379 {
04380       INT16                                     sWorldX, sWorldY;
04381       SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT          MercCreateStruct;
04382       UINT16 usMapPos;
04383       static                                    INT8 bBodyType = FATCIV;
04384       // Get Grid Corrdinates of mouse
04385       if ( GetMouseWorldCoordsInCenter( &sWorldX, &sWorldY ) && GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos ) )
04386       {     
04387             INT8                                      iNewIndex;
04388 
04389             memset( &MercCreateStruct, 0, sizeof( MercCreateStruct ) );
04390             MercCreateStruct.ubProfile          = NO_PROFILE;
04391             MercCreateStruct.sSectorX                 = gWorldSectorX;
04392             MercCreateStruct.sSectorY                 = gWorldSectorY;
04393             MercCreateStruct.bSectorZ                 = gbWorldSectorZ;
04394             MercCreateStruct.bBodyType          = bBodyType;
04395             MercCreateStruct.bDirection = SOUTH;
04396 
04397             bBodyType++;
04398 
04399             if ( bBodyType > KIDCIV )
04400             {
04401                   bBodyType = FATCIV;
04402             }
04403 
04404             MercCreateStruct.bTeam                          = CIV_TEAM;
04405             MercCreateStruct.sInsertionGridNo         = usMapPos;
04406             RandomizeNewSoldierStats( &MercCreateStruct );
04407 
04408             if ( TacticalCreateSoldier( &MercCreateStruct, (UINT8 *)&iNewIndex ) )
04409             {
04410                   AddSoldierToSector( iNewIndex );
04411 
04412                   // So we can see them!
04413                   AllTeamsLookForAll(NO_INTERRUPTS);
04414 
04415             }
04416       }
04417 }

04518       }

04549 void CreatePlayerControlledMonster()
04550 {
04551       INT16                                     sWorldX, sWorldY;
04552       UINT16 usMapPos;
04553       if ( GetMouseWorldCoordsInCenter( &sWorldX, &sWorldY ) && GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos ) )
04554       {            
04555             SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT          MercCreateStruct;
04556             INT8                                      iNewIndex;
04557 
04558             memset( &MercCreateStruct, 0, sizeof( MercCreateStruct ) );
04559             MercCreateStruct.ubProfile          = NO_PROFILE;
04560             MercCreateStruct.sSectorX                 = gWorldSectorX;
04561             MercCreateStruct.sSectorY                 = gWorldSectorY;
04562             MercCreateStruct.bSectorZ                 = gbWorldSectorZ;
04563 
04564             //Note:  only gets called if Alt and/or Ctrl isn't pressed!
04565             if ( _KeyDown( INSERT ) )
04566                   MercCreateStruct.bBodyType          = QUEENMONSTER;
04567                   //MercCreateStruct.bBodyType        = LARVAE_MONSTER;
04568             else
04569                   MercCreateStruct.bBodyType          = ADULTFEMALEMONSTER;                                 
04570             MercCreateStruct.bTeam                    = SOLDIER_CREATE_AUTO_TEAM;
04571             MercCreateStruct.sInsertionGridNo         = usMapPos;
04572             RandomizeNewSoldierStats( &MercCreateStruct );
04573 
04574             if ( TacticalCreateSoldier( &MercCreateStruct, (UINT8 *)&iNewIndex ) )
04575             {
04576                   AddSoldierToSector( iNewIndex );
04577             }
04578       }
04579 }
04580 
04581 
04582 INT8 CheckForAndHandleHandleVehicleInteractiveClick( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usMapPos, BOOLEAN fMovementMode )
04583 {
04584       // Look for an item pool
04585       INT16                                     sActionGridNo;
04586       UINT8                                     ubDirection;
04587       SOLDIERTYPE       *pTSoldier;
04588       INT16                                     sAPCost = 0;
04589 
04590       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound  )
04591       {
04592              pTSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
04593 
04594              if ( OK_ENTERABLE_VEHICLE( pTSoldier ) && pTSoldier->bVisible != -1 && OKUseVehicle( pTSoldier->ubProfile ) )
04595              {
04596                    if ( ( GetNumberInVehicle( pTSoldier->bVehicleID ) == 0 ) || !fMovementMode )
04597                    {
04598                          // Find a gridno closest to sweetspot...
04599                          sActionGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructDataFromSoldier( pSoldier, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, 5, &ubDirection, 0, pTSoldier );
04600 
04601                          if ( sActionGridNo != NOWHERE )
04602                          {
04603                                     // Calculate AP costs...
04604                                     //sAPCost = GetAPsToBeginFirstAid( pSoldier );
04605                                     sAPCost += PlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, FALSE, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
04606 
04607                                     if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0, TRUE ) )
04608                                     {
04609                                           DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_OK1 );
04610 
04611                                           // CHECK IF WE ARE AT THIS GRIDNO NOW
04612                                           if ( pSoldier->sGridNo != sActionGridNo )
04613                                           {
04614                                                 // SEND PENDING ACTION
04615                                                 pSoldier->ubPendingAction = MERC_ENTER_VEHICLE;
04616                                                 pSoldier->sPendingActionData2  = pTSoldier->sGridNo;
04617                                                 pSoldier->bPendingActionData3  = ubDirection;
04618                                                 pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
04619 
04620                                                 // WALK UP TO DEST FIRST
04621                                                 EVENT_InternalGetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, 3 , pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove );
04622                                           }
04623                                           else
04624                                           {
04625                                                 EVENT_SoldierEnterVehicle( pSoldier, pTSoldier->sGridNo, ubDirection );
04626                                           }
04627 
04628                                           // OK, set UI
04629                                           SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
04630                                           //guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
04631 
04632                                           return( -1 );
04633                                     }
04634                          }
04635                    }
04636              }
04637       }
04638 
04639       return( 0 );
04640 }
04641 
04642 void HandleHandCursorClick( UINT16 usMapPos, UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
04643 {
04644       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04645       LEVELNODE                           *pIntTile;
04646   INT16                                         sIntTileGridNo;
04647       INT16                                     sActionGridNo;
04648       UINT8                                     ubDirection;
04649       INT16                                     sAPCost;
04650       INT16                                     sAdjustedGridNo;
04651       STRUCTURE                           *pStructure = NULL;
04652       ITEM_POOL                           *pItemPool;
04653       BOOLEAN                                   fIgnoreItems = FALSE;
04654 
04655 
04656       if(   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
04657       {
04658         // If we are out of breath, no cursor...
04659         if ( pSoldier->bBreath < OKBREATH && pSoldier->bCollapsed )
04660         {
04661               return;
04662         }
04663 
04664             if ( CheckForAndHandleHandleVehicleInteractiveClick( pSoldier, usMapPos, FALSE ) == -1 )
04665             {
04666                   return;
04667             }
04668 
04669 
04670             // Check if we are on a merc... if so.. steal!
04671             if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04672             {
04673                    if ( ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & ENEMY_MERC ) && !( guiUIFullTargetFlags & UNCONSCIOUS_MERC ) )
04674                    {
04675                         sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
04676                         if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
04677                         {
04678                               sActionGridNo = sAdjustedGridNo;
04679                         }
04680 
04681                         // Steal!
04682                         sAPCost = GetAPsToStealItem( pSoldier, sActionGridNo );
04683 
04684                         if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0, TRUE ) )
04685                         {
04686                                     MercStealFromMerc( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ] );
04687 
04688                                     *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
04689 
04690                                     return;
04691                         }
04692         else
04693         {
04694            return;
04695         }
04696                    }
04697             }
04698 
04699             // Default action gridno to mouse....
04700             sActionGridNo = usMapPos;
04701 
04702             // If we are over an interactive struct, adjust gridno to this....
04703             pIntTile = ConditionalGetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( &sIntTileGridNo , &pStructure, FALSE );
04704             if ( pIntTile != NULL )
04705             {
04706                   sActionGridNo = sIntTileGridNo;
04707 
04708                   //if ( pStructure->fFlags & ( STRUCTURE_SWITCH | STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR ) )
04709                   if ( pStructure->fFlags & ( STRUCTURE_SWITCH ) )
04710                   {
04711                         fIgnoreItems = TRUE;
04712                   }
04713 
04714                   if ( pStructure->fFlags & ( STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR ) && sActionGridNo != usMapPos )
04715                   {
04716                         fIgnoreItems = TRUE;
04717                   }
04718             }
04719 
04720             // Check if we are over an item pool
04721             // ATE: Ignore items will be set if over a switch interactive tile...
04722             if ( GetItemPool( sActionGridNo, &pItemPool, pSoldier->bLevel ) && ITEMPOOL_VISIBLE( pItemPool ) && !fIgnoreItems )
04723             {
04724                   if ( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
04725                   {
04726                         // Display message                        
04727                         // ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH ] );
04728                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ EPC_CANNOT_DO_THAT ] );
04729                   }
04730                   else if ( UIOkForItemPickup( pSoldier, sActionGridNo ) )
04731                   {
04732                         INT8 bZLevel;
04733 
04734                         bZLevel = GetZLevelOfItemPoolGivenStructure( sActionGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pStructure );
04735 
04736                         SoldierPickupItem( pSoldier, pItemPool->iItemIndex, sActionGridNo, bZLevel );
04737 
04738                         *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
04739 
04740                   }
04741             }
04742             else
04743             {
04744                   if ( pIntTile != NULL && !( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_HASITEMONTOP ) )
04745                   {
04746                         sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sIntTileGridNo, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, TRUE );
04747                         if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
04748                         {
04749                               sActionGridNo = sIntTileGridNo;
04750                         }
04751 
04752                         // If this is not the same tile as ours, check if we can get to dest!
04753                         if ( sActionGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo && gsCurrentActionPoints == 0 )
04754                         {
04755                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH ] );
04756                         }
04757                         else
04758                         {
04759                               if ( SelectedMercCanAffordMove(  )  )
04760                               {
04761                                     *puiNewEvent = C_MOVE_MERC;
04762                               }
04763                         }
04764                   }
04765                   else
04766                   {
04767                         // ATE: Here, the poor player wants to search something that does not exist...
04768                         // Why should we not let them make fools of themselves....?
04769                     if ( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
04770                     {
04771                           // Display message                      
04772                           // ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH ] );
04773                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ EPC_CANNOT_DO_THAT ] );
04774         }
04775         else
04776         {
04777                           // Check morale, if < threashold, refuse...
04778                           if ( pSoldier->bMorale < 30 )
04779                           {
04780                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_REFUSING_ORDER );
04781                           }
04782                           else
04783                           {
04784                                 if ( gsCurrentActionPoints == 0 )
04785                                 {
04786                                       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH ] );
04787                                 }
04788                                 else
04789                                 {
04790                                       SoldierPickupItem( pSoldier, NOTHING, sActionGridNo, 0 );
04791                                       *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
04792                                 }
04793                           }
04794         }
04795                   }
04796             }
04797       }
04798 }
04799 
04800 
04801 extern BOOLEAN AnyItemsVisibleOnLevel( ITEM_POOL *pItemPool, INT8 bZLevel );
04802 
04803 
04804 void ExchangeMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
04805 {
04806       if ( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04807       {
04808             SwapMercPositions( gpExchangeSoldier1, gpExchangeSoldier2 );
04809       }
04810 }

04812 
04813 INT8 HandleMoveModeInteractiveClick( UINT16 usMapPos, UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
04814 {
04815       // Look for an item pool
04816       ITEM_POOL                           *pItemPool;
04817       BOOLEAN                                   fContinue = TRUE;
04818       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
04819       LEVELNODE                           *pIntTile;
04820   INT16                                         sIntTileGridNo;
04821       INT16                                     sActionGridNo;
04822       UINT8                                     ubDirection;
04823       INT8                                      bReturnCode = 0;
04824       INT8                                      bZLevel;
04825       STRUCTURE                           *pStructure = NULL;
04826 
04827       if(   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
04828       {
04829         // If we are out of breath, no cursor...
04830        // if ( pSoldier->bBreath < OKBREATH )
04831         //{
04832       //      return( -1 );
04833         //}
04834 
04835             // ATE: If we are a vehicle, no moving!
04836             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
04837             {
04838                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ VEHICLE_CANT_MOVE_IN_TACTICAL ] );
04839                   return( -3 );
04840             }
04841 
04842             // OK, check for height differences.....
04843         if ( gpWorldLevelData[ usMapPos ].sHeight != gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].sHeight )
04844             {
04845                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ CANT_GET_THERE ] );
04846                   return( -1 );
04847             }
04848             
04849             // See if we are over a vehicle, and walk up to it and enter....
04850             if ( CheckForAndHandleHandleVehicleInteractiveClick( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE ) == -1 )
04851             {
04852                   return( -1 );
04853             }
04854       
04855             // Check if we are over a civillian....
04856             if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04857             { 
04858                   if ( ValidQuickExchangePosition( ) )
04859                   {
04860                         // Check if we can...
04861                         if ( CanExchangePlaces( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ], TRUE ) )
04862                         {
04863                                gpExchangeSoldier1 = pSoldier;
04864                                gpExchangeSoldier2 = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
04865 
04866                                // Do message box...
04867                                //DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, TacticalStr[ EXCHANGE_PLACES_REQUESTER ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ExchangeMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
04868                                SwapMercPositions( gpExchangeSoldier1, gpExchangeSoldier2 );
04869                         }
04870                   }
04871               return( -3 );
04872             }
04873 
04874             pIntTile = GetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( &sIntTileGridNo, &pStructure );
04875 
04876             if ( pIntTile != NULL )
04877             {
04878                   bReturnCode = -3;
04879 
04880                   // Check if we are over an item pool, take precedence over that.....
04881                   // EXCEPT FOR SWITCHES!
04882                   if ( GetItemPool( sIntTileGridNo, &pItemPool, pSoldier->bLevel ) && !( pStructure->fFlags & ( STRUCTURE_SWITCH | STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR ) ) )
04883                   {
04884                         if ( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
04885                         {
04886                               // Display message                        
04887                               // ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH ] );
04888                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ EPC_CANNOT_DO_THAT ] );
04889                               bReturnCode = -1;
04890                         }
04891                         else if ( UIOkForItemPickup( pSoldier, sIntTileGridNo ) )
04892                         {
04893                               bZLevel = GetLargestZLevelOfItemPool( pItemPool );
04894 
04895                               if ( AnyItemsVisibleOnLevel( pItemPool, bZLevel ) )
04896                               {
04897                                     fContinue = FALSE;
04898 
04899                                     SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
04900 
04901                                     if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) )
04902                                     {
04903                                           //puiNewEvent = C_WAIT_FOR_CONFIRM;                               
04904                                           SoldierPickupItem( pSoldier, pItemPool->iItemIndex, sIntTileGridNo, bZLevel );
04905                                     }
04906                                     else
04907                                     {
04908                                           BeginDisplayTimedCursor( OKHANDCURSOR_UICURSOR, 300 );
04909 
04910                                           SoldierPickupItem( pSoldier, pItemPool->iItemIndex, sIntTileGridNo, bZLevel );
04911                                     }
04912                               }
04913                         }
04914                   }
04915 
04916                   if ( fContinue )
04917                   {
04918                         sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ], sIntTileGridNo, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, TRUE );
04919                         if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
04920                         {
04921                               sActionGridNo = sIntTileGridNo;
04922                         }
04923 
04924                         // If this is not the same tile as ours, check if we can get to dest!
04925                         if ( sActionGridNo != MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->sGridNo && gsCurrentActionPoints == 0 )
04926                         {
04927                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH ] );
04928                               bReturnCode = -1;
04929                         }
04930                         else
04931                         {
04932                               bReturnCode = -2;
04933                         }
04934                   }
04935             }
04936       }
04937 
04938       return( bReturnCode );
04939 }
04940 
04941 
04942 BOOLEAN HandleUIReloading( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04943 {
04944       INT8 bAPs = 0;
04945 
04946       // CHECK OUR CURRENT CURSOR...
04947 
04948       // Do we have the ammo to reload?
04949       if ( guiCurrentUICursor == GOOD_RELOAD_UICURSOR )
04950       {
04951             // Check APs to reload...
04952             bAPs = GetAPsToAutoReload( pSoldier );
04953 
04954             if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, bAPs, 0,TRUE ) )
04955             {
04956                   // OK, we have some ammo we can reload.... reload now!
04957                   if ( !AutoReload( pSoldier ) )
04958                   {
04959                         // Do we say we could not reload gun...?
04960                   }
04961 
04962       // ATE: Re-examine cursor info!
04963       gfUIForceReExamineCursorData = TRUE;
04964             }           
04965             return( TRUE );
04966       }
04967 
04968       if ( guiCurrentUICursor == BAD_RELOAD_UICURSOR )
04969       {
04970             // OK, we have been told to reload but have no ammo...
04971             //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, L"No ammo to reload." );
04972             if ( Random( 3 ) == 0 )
04973             {
04974                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_OUT_OF_AMMO );
04975             }
04976             return( TRUE );
04977       }
04978 
04979       return( FALSE );
04980 }

04985       // OK, most times we want to leave confirm mode if our
04986       // gridno is different... but if we are in the grenade throw
04987       // confirm UI, we want a bigger radius...

04989       //{
04990             // Calculate distence between both gridnos.....
04991       //    if ( GetRangeFromGridNoDiff( GetInAimCubeUIGridNo( ), usOldMapPos ) > 1 )
04992             //if ( usMapPos != usOldMapPos )
04993       //    {
04994       //          return( TRUE );
04995       //    }
04996       //
04997       //else
04998       {
04999             if ( usMapPos != usOldMapPos )
05000             {
05001                   return( TRUE );
05002             }
05003       }
05004 
05005       return( FALSE );
05006 }

05008 void ChangeCurrentSquad( INT32 iSquad )
05009 {
05010       // only allow if nothing in hand and the Change Squad button for whichever panel we're in must be enabled
05011       if ( ( gpItemPointer == NULL ) && !gfDisableTacticalPanelButtons &&
05012                    ( ( gsCurInterfacePanel != TEAM_PANEL ) || ( ButtonList[ iTEAMPanelButtons[ CHANGE_SQUAD_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED ) ) )
05013       {
05014             if ( IsSquadOnCurrentTacticalMap( iSquad ) )
05015             {
05016                   SetCurrentSquad( iSquad, FALSE );
05017             }
05018       }
05019 }

05021 void HandleSelectMercSlot( UINT8 ubPanelSlot, INT8 bCode )
05022 {
05023       UINT8 ubID;
05024 
05025       if ( GetPlayerIDFromInterfaceTeamSlot( ubPanelSlot, &ubID ) )
05026       {
05027             HandleLocateSelectMerc( ubID, bCode );
05028 
05029             ErasePath( TRUE );
05030             gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
05031       }
05032 }
05033 
05034 void TestMeanWhile( INT32 iID )
05035 {
05036       MEANWHILE_DEFINITION MeanwhileDef;
05037       INT32 cnt;
05038       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
05039 
05040       MeanwhileDef.sSectorX = 3;
05041       MeanwhileDef.sSectorY = 16;
05042       MeanwhileDef.ubNPCNumber = QUEEN;
05043       MeanwhileDef.usTriggerEvent = 0;
05044       MeanwhileDef.ubMeanwhileID = (UINT8)iID;
05045 
05046       if ( iID == INTERROGATION )
05047       {
05048             MeanwhileDef.sSectorX = 7;
05049             MeanwhileDef.sSectorY = 14;
05050 
05051             // Loop through our mercs and set gridnos once some found.....
05052             // look for all mercs on the same team, 
05053             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05054 
05055             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
05056             {       
05057                   // Are we a POW in this sector?
05058                   if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
05059                   {
05060                                                 
05061                         ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, ASSIGNMENT_POW );
05062 
05063                         pSoldier->sSectorX = 7;
05064                         pSoldier->sSectorY = 14;
05065                   }
05066             }     
05067 
05068 
05069       }
05070 
05071       ScheduleMeanwhileEvent( &MeanwhileDef, 10 );
05072 }
05073 
05074 void EscapeUILock( )
05075 {
05076       //UNLOCK UI
05077       UnSetUIBusy( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier );
05078 
05079       // Decrease global busy  counter...
05080       gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount = 0;
05081 
05082       guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
05083       UIHandleLUIEndLock( NULL );
05084 }

05086 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
05087 #include "Map Edgepoints.h"
05088 void ToggleMapEdgepoints()
05089 {
05090       #ifdef JA2EDITOR
05091             static BOOLEAN fToggleEdgepointDisplay = FALSE;
05092             if( fToggleEdgepointDisplay ^= TRUE )
05093             { //Show edgepoints
05094                   ShowMapEdgepoints();
05095             }
05096             else
05097             { //Hide edgepoints
05098                   HideMapEdgepoints();
05099             }
05100             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
05101       #endif
05102 }
05103 #endif

05105 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
05106 BOOLEAN gfMercsNeverQuit = FALSE;
05107 void ToggleMercsNeverQuit()
05108 {
05109       if( gfMercsNeverQuit )
05110       {
05111             gfMercsNeverQuit = FALSE;
05112             ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Merc contract expiring enabled." );
05113       }
05114       else
05115       {
05116             gfMercsNeverQuit ^= TRUE;
05117             ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Merc contract expiring disabled." );
05118       }
05119 }

05122 
05123 void HandleStanceChangeFromUIKeys( UINT8 ubAnimHeight )
05124 {
05125       // If we have multiple guys selected, make all change stance!
05126       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
05127       INT32                               cnt;
05128       SOLDIERTYPE             *pFirstSoldier = NULL;
05129       
05130       if ( gTacticalStatus.fAtLeastOneGuyOnMultiSelect )
05131       {
05132             // OK, loop through all guys who are 'multi-selected' and
05133             // check if our currently selected guy is amoung the
05134             // lucky few.. if not, change to a guy who is...
05135             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05136             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
05137             {
05138                   if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
05139                   {
05140                         if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED )
05141                         {
05142                               UIHandleSoldierStanceChange( pSoldier->ubID, ubAnimHeight );
05143                         }
05144                   }
05145             }
05146       }
05147       else
05148       {
05149             if( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
05150                   UIHandleSoldierStanceChange( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier, ubAnimHeight );
05151       }
05152 }
05153 
05154 void ToggleStealthMode( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
05155 {
05156       // nothing in hand and either not in SM panel, or the matching button is enabled if we are in SM panel
05157       if ( ( gsCurInterfacePanel != SM_PANEL ) || ( ButtonList[ giSMStealthButton ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED ) )
05158   {
05159         // ATE: Toggle stealth
05160         if ( gpSMCurrentMerc != NULL && pSoldier->ubID == gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID )
05161         {
05162               gfUIStanceDifferent = TRUE;
05163         }
05164 
05165         pSoldier->bStealthMode = ! pSoldier->bStealthMode;
05166         gfPlotNewMovement   = TRUE;
05167         fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05168 
05169         if ( pSoldier->bStealthMode )
05170         {
05171               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_MERC_ON_STEALTHMODE ], pSoldier->name );
05172         }
05173         else
05174         {
05175               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_MERC_OFF_STEALTHMODE ], pSoldier->name );
05176         }
05177   }
05178 }
05179 
05180 
05181 void HandleStealthChangeFromUIKeys(  )
05182 {
05183       // If we have multiple guys selected, make all change stance!
05184       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
05185       INT32                               cnt;
05186       SOLDIERTYPE             *pFirstSoldier = NULL;
05187       
05188       if ( gTacticalStatus.fAtLeastOneGuyOnMultiSelect )
05189       {
05190             // OK, loop through all guys who are 'multi-selected' and
05191             // check if our currently selected guy is amoung the
05192             // lucky few.. if not, change to a guy who is...
05193             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05194             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
05195             {
05196                   if ( pSoldier->bActive && !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) && pSoldier->bInSector )
05197                   {
05198                         if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED )
05199                         {
05200                               ToggleStealthMode( pSoldier );
05201                         }
05202                   }
05203             }
05204       }
05205       else
05206       {
05207             if( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
05208     {
05209       if ( !AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] ) )
05210       {
05211         ToggleStealthMode( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] );
05212       }
05213     }
05214       }
05215 }

05218 
05219 void TestCapture( )
05220 {
05221       INT32 cnt;
05222       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
05223       UINT32                              uiNumChosen = 0;
05224 
05225       //StartQuest( QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
05226       //EndQuest( QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
05227 
05228       BeginCaptureSquence( );
05229 
05230       gStrategicStatus.uiFlags &= (~STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_RESCUE );
05231 
05232       // loop through sodliers and pick 3 lucky ones....
05233       for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].bFirstID, pSoldier=MercPtrs[cnt]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
05234       {
05235             if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
05236             {     
05237                   if ( uiNumChosen < 3 )
05238                   {
05239                         EnemyCapturesPlayerSoldier( pSoldier );
05240                         
05241                         // Remove them from tectical....
05242                         RemoveSoldierFromGridNo( pSoldier );
05243 
05244                         uiNumChosen++;
05245                   }
05246             }
05247       }
05248 
05249       EndCaptureSequence( );
05250 }
